product_desc: Mons Base Division is a membership based company dedicated to bringing real lifestyles back by creating a solution of real estate, agriculture and modern life. Not more work. MBD consists of three buildings containing 348 residences, 60 shops, and providing food, water, education and security to it's residents. We employ our residents at a household rate of 20 hours per graduate to optimize work/life balance while creating healthy, intelligent and compassionate citizens. By creating a new sense of community MBD hopes to foster a modern culture community in the American Midwest.
high_concept: Millenial edition company social security. People only have so much money.
name: MONS BASE DIVISION
